text_block_list.text:
"I need to talk to you". The words which she nervously spilled 
were followed by a prolonged silence, before she continued 
to disclose her inner thoughts ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you know…! So, I've been kinda thinking 
about how I want to try run freely and stuff…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
To run like during the freestyle… no, even more so than then. 
Full speed ahead without holding back from the beginning! 
Something like that. I think that sounds nice, kinda ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I just think… that would be the most fun way to run. 
I want to give it a shot… and I think I can pull it off.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
And so, um… what do you think, Trainer? 
Ahaha, am I asking for a bit too much?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
I mean, it kinda is a big gamble… I'd probably be 
so exhausted sometimes, crawling over the line 
to an unsightly defeat, completely destroyed…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, that might be a bit too much —— 
For a Mejiro horsegirl, I may be stepping over a line.

After mustering up the resolve, I directed an inquiry 
to the ever-serious Mejiro Palmer who was quietly 
letting her feelings out.
choice_data_list: <size=31>Your dream was to etch your name in history, wasn't it?</size>
<size=31>Your dream was to etch your name in history, wasn't it?</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, yeah, that's right, but……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ah ——

text_block_list.name: Freestyle Race Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: PAL-MER! PAL-MER! PAL-MER! PAL-MER!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (T-That's right. That's right…… I'm…!!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
…… Yeah. Trainer!! Starting from today, could you put together 
a menu that highly specializes in running away from the pack? 
And also…… please set up a mock race, too!

Thus began my new training with Mejiro Palmer, focusing solely 
on honing her ability to outrun the pack.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Hah, ha, hah, haaa! My start dash……! How was that? Is something like this——?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: M-More?! How am I supposed to—?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
(Great escape… no actually, ultra-great escape…?! 
Ultra isn't enough… I need more? More of… that's right ——)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Raise the roof! Run like fireworks!! Have the most fun!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— Explosive escape, is that it?! Haaaaaaaaa————!!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— Haaa—! Haaah—! Haaa～～～～! Oh damn, my breath… seriously, I can't… no more!!
choice_data_list: <size=38>A-Are you okay?! But, your running just now…!</size>
<size=38>A-Are you okay?! But, your running just now…!</size>

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Uheeeh—! Haaaaah～～～! …… Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: That was soooo hype……!!
And then it was time for the mock race ——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
WEI, WEI, WEI, WEEEEEIII～～～☆ 
Pam, my girl, lemme see you kill it out there!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Okiedokie artichokie! Let's partaaay～! 
I'mma leave everyone in the dust for real. LESSGO!!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Uh, huuh. Not sure if they're being energetic or just carefree, haha…… Is she going to be okay? If I remember correctly, she lost quite badly the other day, didn't she…?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, you're talking about the Selection Race that Mejiro Ryan 
participated in? Yeah, but more importantly, what I'm excited 
about is that girl over there ——

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
Ahhaha! Looks like I'm totally being 
treated as a dark horse again, huh～? 
… Fine with me, I'm getting fired up!
choice_data_list:
Hold your head high and show them 
what your running is made of!

Hold your head high and show them 
what your running is made of!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Gotcha!! Well then — see ya in a bit!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
…… Ryan, let us find a place with a better view. 
Something about Palmer feels different today…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
McQueen… ! Yeah, that's a good idea. 
… I was thinking the same thing!
(—— Clang!!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: —— GUAAAAAAAAARGH!!

text_block_list.name: Participant Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: E-Eh?! Wait, what…? She's so fast…?!

text_block_list.name: Participant Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Ehh, isn't she going way too fast?! 
We literally just started…!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Haah, haa, haah, haaaa—— …… AHAHAHAHAHA!!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: (Just have a great time!! I'll find my true self in that!!)

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: HAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!
(WHOOAAAAAAAA?!!!)

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: N-No way!! Unbelievable… did she just win like that?!!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That's a completely reckless way of outrunning…!

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: So that…… is what Mejiro Palmer is like!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
That's amazing… incredible! Palmer's running… it feels 
completely different from any Mejiro I've seen before…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So, in other words, this is Mejiro Palmer's running style. 
… It looks like we cannot afford to let our guard down.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
PAAAALMEEERRRRR!! You smashed it hard!! 
That was absolute fire, no cap, legit sick display……!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: YOU WERE LAUGHING TO THE LINE～～!! My Palmer girl is THE BEST!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text: Ahhahaha! Thanks, Helios! You too, fam, you're my sunshine!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
… And thanks, Trainer! For constantly pushing me forward! 
So you know, from now on, let's continue to…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Palmer
text_block_list.text:
HYPE IT UUUP——!! 
WEIIIIIIIII～～～～～!!

… Until the name Mejiro Palmer is engraved in history, 
I will continue to support her to the best of my ability!
